key_talking_points: Florida's Sam Bennett was penalized for holding the stick at 17:06 remaining in the first period, putting Edmonton on the power play.
Florida and Edmonton are trading shots early in the first period, with the score 5-4 in favor of Florida. Edmonton has a power play opportunity to potentially tie the game.
for_commentary_agent.context: A penalty creates a power play opportunity for Edmonton to close the gap. Good time to focus on special teams and scoring chances.

high_intensity_events.summary: Sam Bennett (FLA) called for holding the stick at 17:06 of the first.
Three shots on goal in quick succession by both FLA and EDM.
Anton Lundell (FLA) penalized for tripping at 16:28, Edmonton on the power play.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Edmonton power play and Florida's penalty kill. Highlight key players involved.
